resources.string: By clicking on \"Continue\" below, you are agreeing the EULA.

Welcome to the registration application of Contoso Festival! Our festival has decided to use facial recognitition technology to authorize incoming guests. You will be required to provide some personal information as well as pictures of yourself to enter the festival.
Do not use punctuates and type 3 characters
Must be alphanumeric and least 3 characters
Must be alphanumeric and least 3 characters

Please upload 3 pictures of yourself to finalize your registration. You will be authorized by these pictures as you enter the event. Every picture that you upload should differ from the others in some way to ensure easy recognition.
You need to provide at least one photo about you.

To finalize your registration, you should provide some pictures about yourself. This will authorise you on the event. It\'s recommended to provide a bit different photos about you, to enchant face identify result that will authorize you on the event.
Registration failed. Please try again later.
Thank you for Registering! We successfully added you to our list of known faces.
No faces detected. Try again with an other picture.
One face is allowed in the picture. Try again with an other picture.
